name: Lucky Seven
description:
The Lucky Seven Demo is now available for download! If you encounter any bugs, glitches, or typos, please leave a comment here or send an ask to the tumblr blog.

Think the high-grossing It movies should've been more of a romcom than a horror? You're in luck!

This pixel art comedy dating sim visual novel game (say that seven times fast) is a real labor of love.  A mish-mash between the canons of the original novel,  the miniseries, the movies, and the beloved parody musical,  the game is packed with references to all of its inspirations. This is a long-winded way of saying that Lucky Seven is a fangame for Stephen King's It.

Charm, humor, romance, gay people- what more could you ask for? Play the game. You know you want to.

Developer: CarbonatedAvocados
Release Frame: When the time is right
Rating: Teen

FULL GAME FEATURES:

  • Three different stops through life: kids, teens, and adults, plus an epilogue!
  • Customize your name and pronouns
  • Change your pronouns at any time as you grow!
  • Seven love interests, hence the title
  • "Moments menus" that provide built-in stopping points
  • And, of course, more!

For songs and sound effects used, check the “credits” tab from the main or game menu.
